doc.author: Rohit Thakur (@rohitthakur2590)
description: This module manages global ospfv3 configuration on devices running Cisco IOS-XR
notes: This module works with connection C(network_cli). See L(the IOS-XR Platform Options,../network/user_guide/platform_iosxr.html)

config.description: A list of ospfv3 process configuration

processes.description: A list of ospfv3 instances configuration

address_family_unicast.description: Enable unicast topology for ipv4 address family

area_id.description: Area ID as IP address or integer

spi.description: Specify the Security Parameter Index value

strict_mode.description: Hold down neighbor session until BFD session is up

database_filter.description: Filter LSAs during synchronization and flooding

dead_interval.description: Interval after which a neighbor is declared dead

default_cost.description: Set the summary default-cost of a NSSA/stub area. Stub's advertised external route metric

distrinbute_rib_prefix_list_name.description: Filter LSAs during synchronization and flooding

ipsec.description: Specify IPSec ESP encryption and authentication

algorithim_type.description: Specify the bit encryption for aes algorithim

clear_key.description: Specify AES key in cleartext form

password_key.description: Specify AES key in encrypted form

clear_key.description: Specify AES key in cleartext form

password_key.description: Specify AES key in encrypted form

triple_des.description: This specify the triple DES algorithim

spi.description: Specify the Security Parameter Index value

information_type.description: Specify per-link LFA exclusion or FRR LFA candidate information

pw_iw.description: Specify PWHE VC11 IP Interworking Interface

tunnel_mte.description: Specify MPLS Traffic Engineering P2MP Tunnel interface(s)

use_candidate_only.description: Enable/Disable backup selection from candidate-list only

information_type.description: Specify per_prefix LFA exclusion or FRR LFA candidate information

pw_iw.description: Specify PWHE VC11 IP Interworking Interface

tunnel_mte.description: Specify MPLS Traffic Engineering P2MP Tunnel interface(s)

use_candidate_only.description: Enable/Disable backup selection from candidate-list only

mtu_ignore.description: Enable/Disable ignoring of MTU in DBD packets

set.description: Set nssa to default information originate

no_redistribution.description: Do not send redistributed LSAs into NSSA area

no_summary.description: Do not send summary LSAs into NSSA area

packet_size.description: Specify limit size of OSPFv3 packets

passive.description: Enable/Disable routing updates on an interface

prefix_suppression.description: Hide all transit addresses on this interface

ranges.description: Summarize routes matching address/mask (border routers only)

cost.description: Specify user specified metric for this range

stub.description: Settings for configuring the area as a stub

no_summary.description: Do not send summary LSA into stub area

set.description: Configure the area as a stub

transmit_delay.description: Specify estimated time needed to send link-state update packet

spi.description: Specify the Security Parameter Index value

dead_interval.description: Interval after which a neighbor is declared dead

paths.description: Specify limit for number of paths

mtu_ignore.description: Enable/Disable ignoring of MTU in DBD packets

nsr.description: Enable/Disable NSR for all VRFs in this process

packet_size.description: Specify limit size of OSPFv3 packets

passive.description: Enable/Disable routing updates on an interface

router_id.description: ospfv3 router-id in IPv4 address format (A.B.C.D)

route_policy.description: Specify the route-policy to prioritize route install

value.description: Specify parameter values for the policy ()

always.description: Force ospfv3 stub router mode unconditionally

external_lsa.description: Override External LSA metric in stub router mode

metric.description: Metric to use while in stub router mode

include_stub.description: Set maximum metric for stub links in stub router mode

on_proc_migration.description: Enter stub router mode on ospfv3 process migration

on_proc_restart.description: Enter stub router mode on ospfv3 process restart

on_startup.description: Enter stub router mode on startup

time.description: Time in seconds to stay in stub router mode

wait_for_bgp.description: Exit stub router mode when BGP converges

on_switchover.description: Enter stub router mode on RP switchover

summary_lsa.description: Override Summary LSA metric in stub router mode

metric.description: Metric to use while in stub router mode

not_advertise.description: Suppress routes that match the specified prefix/mask pair

all_lsa_initial.description: Delay to generate first occurrence of LSA in milliseconds

all_lsa_minimum.description: Minimum delay between originating the same LSA in milliseconds

spf_initial.description: Delay to generate first occurrence of SPF in ms

spf_minimum.description: Minimum delay between originating the same SPF in ms

size.description: Delete existing buffer and create one with N entries

transmit_delay.description: Estimated time needed to send link-state update packet

description: This option is used only with state I(parsed).
The value of this option should be the output received from the IOS-XR device by executing the command B(show running-config router ospfv3).

The state I(parsed) reads the configuration from C(running_config) option and transforms it into Ansible structured data as per the resource module's argspec and the value is then returned in the I(parsed) key within the result.
The state the configuration should be left in

cisco.iosxr.iosxr_ospfv3.examples:
# Using merged

# Before state:
# -------------
#
# RP/0/RP0/CPU0:anton#show running-config router ospfv3
# Thu Jun 11 15:54:44.569 UTC
# % No such configuration item(s)
#

- name: Merge provided OSPFv3 configuration with the existing configuration
  cisco.iosxr.iosxr_ospfv3:
    config:
      processes:
        - process_id: 27
          areas:
            - area_id: 10
              hello_interval: 2
        - process_id: 26
          authentication:
            disable: true
        - process_id: 10
          areas:
            - area_id: 11
              default_cost: 5
              cost: 11
            - area_id: 22
              default_cost: 6
        - process_id: 30
          areas:
            - area_id: 11
              default_cost: 5
            - area_id: 22
              default_cost: 6
          cost: 2
          default_metric: 10
          transmit_delay: 2
          hello_interval: 1
          dead_interval: 2
          retransmit_interval: 2
          packet_size: 577
          priority: 1
          router_id: '2.2.2.2'
          demand_circuit: true
          mtu_ignore: true
    state: merged

#
#
# ------------------------
# Module Execution Result
# ------------------------
#
#  "before": {}
#
#  "commands": [
#         "router ospfv3 10",
#         "area 11 default-cost 5",
#         "area 11 cost 11",
#         "area 22 default-cost 6",
#         "router ospfv3 26",
#         "authentication disable",
#         "router ospfv3 27",
#         "area 10 hello-interval 2",
#         "router ospfv3 30",
#         "cost 2",
#         "priority 1",
#         "default-metric 10",
#         "router-id 2.2.2.2",
#         "demand-circuit",
#         "packet-size 577",
#         "transmit-delay 2",
#         "dead-interval 2",
#         "hello-interval 1",
#         "retransmit-interval 2",
#         "mtu-ignore",
#         "area 11 default-cost 5",
#         "area 22 default-cost 6"
#    ]
#
#  "after": {

#                     {

#                         "cost": 11,
#                         "default_cost": 5
#                     },

#                 ],
#                 "process_id": "10"
#             },

#                     "disable": true

#             },
#             {

#                         "hello_interval": 2
#                     }
#                 ],
#                 "process_id": "27"
#             },
#             {

#                         "area_id": "11",
#                         "default_cost": 5
#                     },
#                     {

#                         "default_cost": 6
#                     }
#                 ],
#                 "cost": 2,
#                 "dead_interval": 2,
#                 "default_metric": 10,
#                 "demand_circuit": true,
#                 "hello_interval": 1,
#                 "mtu_ignore": true,
#                 "packet_size": 577,
#                 "priority": 1,
#                 "process_id": "30",
#                 "retransmit_interval": 2,

#
# ------------

- name: Replace OSPFv3 routes configurations from the device
  cisco.iosxr.iosxr_ospfv3:
    config:
      processes:
        - process_id: 27
          areas:
            - area_id: 10
              hello_interval: 2
            - area_id: 20
              cost: 2
              default_cost: 2
        - process_id: 26
          authentication:
            disable: true
    state: replaced

- name: Override existing OSPFv3 configurations from the device
  cisco.iosxr.iosxr_ospfv3:
    config:
      processes:
        - process_id: 27
          areas:
            - area_id: 10
              hello_interval: 2
              authentication:
                disable: true
            - area_id: 20
              cost: 2
              default_cost: 2
              authentication:
                disable: true
        - process_id: 26
          areas:
            - area_id: 10
              hello_interval: 2
              authentication:
                disable: true
    state: overridden

- name: Deleted existing OSPFv3 configurations from the device
  cisco.iosxr.iosxr_ospfv3:
    config:
      processes:
      - process_id: '10'
      - process_id: '26'
      - process_id: '27'
      - process_id: '30'
    state: deleted

#
#
# ------------------------
# Module Execution Result
# ------------------------
#
#  "before": {
#         "processes": [
#             {

#             },

#                         "hello_interval": 4
#                     }
#                 ],

#                     "disable": true
#                 },
#                 "process_id": "26"
#             },
#             {

#                     {
#                         "area_id": "10",

#                     },

#                         "default_cost": 2

#         "no area 10 hello-interval 4",
#         "router ospfv3 27",

#         "no area 20 cost 2"

#            },

#            },

#            }
#        ]

#
#
# -----------
# After state
# -----------
#
# RP/0/RP0/CPU0:anton(config)#show running-config router ospfv3
# router ospfv3 10
# !
# router ospfv3 26
# !
# router ospfv3 27
# !
# router ospfv3 30
# !


# Using parsed
# parsed.cfg
# ------------
# router ospfv3 10
#  area 11
#   cost 11
#   default-cost 5
#  !
#  area 22
#   default-cost 6
#  !
# !
# router ospfv3 26
#  authentication disable
# !
# router ospfv3 27
#  area 10
#   hello-interval 2
#  !
# !
# router ospfv3 30
#  router-id 2.2.2.2
#  cost 2
#  packet-size 577
#  priority 1
#  mtu-ignore
#  dead-interval 2
#  retransmit-interval 2
#  demand-circuit
#  hello-interval 1
#  transmit-delay 2
#  default-metric 10
#  area 11
#   default-cost 5
#  !
#  area 22
#   default-cost 6
#  !
# !
- name: Parsed the device configuration to get output commands
  cisco.iosxr.iosxr_ospfv3:
    running_config: "{{ lookup('file', './parsed.cfg') }}"
    state: parsed
#
#
# -------------------------
# Module Execution Result
# -------------------------
#
#
# "parsed": {
#         "processes": [
#             {
#                 "areas": [
#                     {
#                         "area_id": "11",
#                         "cost": 11,
#                         "default_cost": 5
#                     },
#                     {
#                         "area_id": "22",
#                         "default_cost": 6
#                     }
#                 ],
#                 "process_id": "10"
#             },
#             {
#                 "authentication": {
#                     "disable": true
#                 },
#                 "process_id": "26"
#             },
#             {
#                 "areas": [
#                     {
#                         "area_id": "10",
#                         "hello_interval": 2
#                     }
#                 ],
#                 "process_id": "27"
#             },
#             {
#                 "areas": [
#                     {
#                         "area_id": "11",
#                         "default_cost": 5
#                     },
#                     {
#                         "area_id": "22",
#                         "default_cost": 6
#                     }
#                 ],
#                 "cost": 2,
#                 "dead_interval": 2,
#                 "default_metric": 10,
#                 "demand_circuit": true,
#                 "hello_interval": 1,
#                 "mtu_ignore": true,
#                 "packet_size": 577,
#                 "priority": 1,
#                 "process_id": "30",
#                 "retransmit_interval": 2,
#                 "router_id": "2.2.2.2",
#                 "transmit_delay": 2
#             }
#         ]
#     }
#
# Using rendered
#
#
- name: Render the commands for provided  configuration
  cisco.iosxr.iosxr_ospfv3:
    config:
      processes:
        - process_id: 27
          areas:
            - area_id: 10
              hello_interval: 2
        - process_id: 26
          authentication:
            disable: true
        - process_id: 10
          areas:
            - area_id: 11
              default_cost: 5
              cost: 11
            - area_id: 22
              default_cost: 6
        - process_id: 30
          areas:
            - area_id: 11
              default_cost: 5
            - area_id: 22
              default_cost: 6
          cost: 2
          default_metric: 10
          transmit_delay: 2
          hello_interval: 1
          dead_interval: 2
          retransmit_interval: 2
          packet_size: 577
          priority: 1
          router_id: '2.2.2.2'
          demand_circuit: true
          mtu_ignore: true
    state: rendered

#
#
# -------------------------
# Module Execution Result
# -------------------------
#
#
# "rendered": [
#         "router ospfv3 27",
#         "area 10 hello-interval 2",
#         "router ospfv3 26",
#         "authentication disable",
#         "router ospfv3 10",
#         "area 11 default-cost 5",
#         "area 11 cost 11",
#         "area 22 default-cost 6",
#         "router ospfv3 30",
#         "cost 2",
#         "priority 1",
#         "default-metric 10",
#         "router-id 2.2.2.2",
#         "demand-circuit",
#         "packet-size 577",
#         "transmit-delay 2",
#         "dead-interval 2",
#         "hello-interval 1",
#         "retransmit-interval 2",
#         "mtu-ignore",
#         "area 11 default-cost 5",
#         "area 22 default-cost 6"
#     ]


# Using gathered
#
# Before state:
# -------------
#
# RP/0/RP0/CPU0:anton#show running-config router ospf
# router ospfv3 10
#  area 11
#   cost 11
#   default-cost 5
#  !
#  area 22
#   default-cost 6
#  !
# !
# router ospfv3 26
#  authentication disable
#  area 10
#  !
# !
# router ospfv3 27
#  area 10
#   hello-interval 2
#  !
#  area 20
#  !
#  area 30
#  !
# !
# router ospfv3 30
#  cost 2
#  priority 1
#  mtu-ignore
#  packet-size 577
#  dead-interval 2
#  retransmit-interval 2
#  demand-circuit
#  hello-interval 1
#  transmit-delay 2
#  router-id 2.2.2.2
#  default-metric 10
#  area 11
#   default-cost 5
#  !
#  area 22
#   default-cost 6
#  !
# !

- name: Gather ospfv3 routes configuration
  cisco.iosxr.iosxr_ospfv3:
    state: gathered
